src:
Slab ljubimec se izdaja sam
Kaj lahko od njega pričakujete v postelji, je mogoče ugotoviti, preden pride do intimnega spoznavanja.
05 Nov 2019, 20:52 by M. F.
Je šarmanten, lep na pogled, skratka privlačen, kaj pa lahko od njega pričakujete v postelji? Naj vas njegov lepi videz ne zavede, kajti čeprav ljudje atraktivnežem praviloma pripisujemo tudi izjemne posteljne veščine, vas bo morda razočaral. Obstajajo drugi znaki, ki pričajo o tem, kaj zmore in zna. Morda v resnici ni tako dober ljubimec, kot si želite, da bi bil ...
V resnici ga ne zanimate
Redno se sestajata in veliko časa preživita skupaj, a če ga ne zanima, kakšna je vaša preteklost, kaj načrtujete v prihodnosti, kaj se vam vsak dan dogaja v službi ali doma, kaj imate radi in česa ne marate, potem si med rjuhami ne obetajte preveč. Če ni pozoren zunaj spalnice, tudi v njej ne bo.
Obseden je s svojim videzom
Nič ni narobe, da skrbi zase, toda če negi obraza in telesa namenja preveč pozornosti, to niso najboljši obeti. Bolj kot s tem, kako uživate, se bo namreč v postelji obremenjeval s tem, kako je videti tedaj, ko ga ujame val strasti.
Nespreten je
Morda se vam zdi simpatično, ko se spotakne na stopnicah ali mu stvari vedno padajo iz rok, a če se mu to redno dogaja in ne more zabiti žeblja, ne da bi se udaril po prstu, bo nespreten tudi v postelji.
Nima življenjskih ciljev
Ni treba, da je bogat in neizmerno ambiciozen, vendar bi moral vsakdo imeti v življenju cilje, za dosego katerih si bo prizadeval. Kajti pomanjkanje strasti do življenja nakazuje tudi pomanjkanje strasti med rjuhami.
Ne skrbi za zdravje
Kar pomeni, da mu je telovadba španska vas, prav tako zdrava prehrana. Skrb za zdravje in zdravo telo sta prva pogoja za dober seks. Prav tako se med vadbo razvijajo veščine, ki jih lahko s pridom uporabi tudi v postelji.
Pri prvem poljubu je vse šlo zelo hitro
Prvi poljub je pomemben. Ne samo zato, ker je prvi, temveč tudi, ker veliko pove o njem, o vas in vajinem odnosu. Če se zgodi vse zelo hitro, brez nežnega objema in tesnega dotika, tudi v postelji ni mogoče pričakovati, da bo skrben, pozoren in se bo potrudil, da bi tudi vi doživeli vrhunec.
text:
The bad lover betrays himself
What you can expect from him in bed can be determined before he gets to know each other intimately.
05 Nov 2019, 20:52 by M.F.
He is charming, beautiful in appearance, attractive in short, what can you expect from him in bed? Do not be deceived by his beautiful appearance, because although people usually attribute extraordinary bed skills to attractive people, it may disappoint you. There are other characters who testify to what he can and does know. He may not really be as good a lover as you want him to be ...
You are not really interested in him
They meet regularly and spend a lot of time together, but if you don't care what your past is, what you plan for the future, what happens to you at work or at home every day, what you love and don't like, then don't look promising too much. If he's not paying attention outside the bedroom, he won't be in it either.
He is obsessed with his appearance
There is nothing wrong with taking care of yourself, but if you pay too much attention to face and body care, these are not the best prospects. More than how you enjoy it, he will be overwhelmed in bed by what he looks like when he is trapped by a wave of passion.
He is clumsy
You may find it nice when he stumbles on the stairs or things always fall out of his hands, but if he does this regularly and can't nail it without hitting his finger, he'll be clumsy in bed as well.
He has no life goals
He does not have to be rich and immensely ambitious, but everyone should have goals in his life that he will strive for. Because the lack of passion for life also indicates the lack of passion among the sheets.
Don't worry about health
Which means his workout is a Spanish village, as is a healthy diet. Taking care of your health and a healthy body are the first conditions for good sex. They also develop skills during exercise that they can use well in bed.
With the first kiss, everything went really fast
The first kiss is important. Not only because he is the first, but also because he says a lot about him, about you and your relationship. If everything happens very quickly, without a gentle hug and a tight touch, even in bed you cannot expect him to be caring, alert, and will do his best to bring you the climax as well.
